title: gAngEyA guNabhUSaNA
sahitya:
gAngEyA guNabhUSaNA ennaik-kA karuNai vEndA


anupallavi

  AnkAra mamakAra arakkarai azhi shivakkanalE


caraNam    hInap-paghaivar shUzhcci ennai mAnabhangam sheidiDAmal
eDutta paNiyai muDittuk-koDuppAi igalai vellum guha SaNmukha
jnAna paNDita gurunAthA namaskAram praNava bOdhA
